1.Name: CustomProductContainerCapacities
1.Description: Used to discover the reception container capacity

1.Name: IsWaferReception
1.Description: If set marks the Step as wafer reception

1.Name: WaferReception
1.Description: Wafer Reception Service used to resolve RecipeContext
DEE Action used to send AdHoc Transfer Information to Lot.

2.Description: DEE Action used by IoT to validate Material Reception of substrates.

1.Name: CustomValueDoesNotExistLookupTable
1.Description: Error message to inform that value does not exist on LookupTable.
1.en-US: Row {0} does not exist on LookupTable {1}.

2.Name: CustomResourceIsNotSorter
2.Description: Error message to inform that a Resource is not a Sorter.

3.Name: CustomResourceNotOnline
3.Description: Error message to inform that a Resource is not online.
3.en-US: Resource {0} does not have automation mode online.

4.Name: CustomResourceNotDescendant
4.Description: Error message to inform that a SubResource is descendant of a given Parent Resource.
4.en-US: Resource {0} is not a descendent of {1}.

5.Name: CustomResourceInUse
5.Description: Error message to inform that a SubResource is descendant of a given Parent Resource.

6.Name: CustomSmartTableNoResolution
6.Description: Error message to inform that does not exist any row resolved for a given SmartTable
6.en-US: Not able to resolve any {0} from SmartTable {1}.

7.Name: CustomConvertToType
7.Description: Error message to inform that is not possible to convert to a given type

8.Name: CustomResourceNoDockerContainer
8.Description: Error message to inform that does not exist any Container docked on a given Resource
8.en-US: Resource {0} does not have any container docked.

9.Name: CustomResourceNoEnoughPositionsOrInUse
9.Description: Error message to inform that does not exist enough position on the docked Containers or are all in use on a given Resource
9.en-US: Resource {0} does not have any sufficient positions or it is in use.

10.Name: CustomResourceContainerDockedDifferentProducts
10.Description: Error message to inform that does not exist docked Containers with the same product on a given Resource
10.en-US: Resource {0} containers are from different Product(s). Expected: {1}.

11.Name: CustomResourceContainersNoEnoughPositions
11.Description: Error message to inform that does not exist enough available positions in docked containers on a given Resource
11.en-US: Not enough available positions in docked containers. Expected: {0}. Found {1}.

12.Name: CustomResourceContainersWrongPositions
12.Description: Error message to inform that exists Materials docked on the wrong positions on a given Resource
12.en-US: Found materials on the wrong positions. Check position {0} on {1}.

13.Name: CustomStepNoWaferReception
13.Description: Error message to inform that Step is not marked as Wafer Reception
13.en-US: Step {0} is not marked as Wafer Reception. Expected: {1} attribute set to true.

14.Name: CustomContainerDifferentProducts
14.Description: Error message to inform that Container has a different product from a given one
14.en-US: Container {0} has materials of different product(s). Expected: {1}.
